scripts.all: npm run build && npm run setup
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && gnome-extensions pack --force foresight@pesader.dev -o dist/
scripts.setup: gnome-extensions uninstall foresight@pesader.dev 2>/dev/null || true && gnome-extensions install --force dist/foresight@pesader.dev.shell-extension.zip
scripts.fmt-lint: npm run fmt && npm run lint
scripts.fmt-lint:fix: npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint:fix
